modName: IPM - Insane Alchemy - Potions Poisons and Others High Polygons Bottles
summary: Insane Alchemy is a modification that changing potions, poisons and other bottles in game by replacing original meshes. On a more "insane" that is now all are transparent and you can see their content.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][size=3][color=#005502][b][size=6]Insane Alchemy
[size=5]Potions Poisons and Others High Polygons Bottles[/size][size=5][/size][/size]
[/b][/color][/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/gIYkDFl.gif[/img]
[color=#FF9900][b]
[size=5]Description[/size]
[/b][/color]
[size=3]This would not be possible without [color=#3c78d8][b][url=http://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/topic/4136-nifskope-20-dev/]NifSkope[/url][/b][/color], [color=#3c78d8][b][url=https://github.com/figment/max_nif_plugin/releases]3ds Max Nif Plugin[/url][/b][/color][/size], [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]xEdit[/url][/b].

Modification changing size of potions, poisons and other bottles in game by replacing original meshes.
[size=3]On a more "insane" that is now all are transparent and you can see their content.[/size]

Modification does not contain any *.esp *.esm files replaces only *.nif, so is compatible with almost any modification which edits potions or poisons and replaces textures[b] [color=#ff0000][size=3][u]but does not change meshes.[/u][/size][/color][/b]

Can be installed and uninstalled at any time without any complications.
([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1840/?]Wrye Bash[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/?]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] after uninstalling restores previously replaced files)
Installer is compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1840/?]Wrye Bash[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/?]Nexus Mod Manager[/url].
[size=3][b]
[color=#ff7700][size=4]Recommended complementary modifications[/size][/color][/b][/size]

[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62701/?]RUSTIC POTIONS and POISONS[/url] by [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5712421][b]Gamwich[/b][/url]
[color=#ff0000][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/download/1000144888/?](Only for version 1.0)[/url][/b][/color][size=2]
[b]I recommend options 1k.
Bottles are reduced approximately 50-70% so quality of appearance is enhanced.
In other words, texture is displayed on smaller surface which results in an improvement of its visual quality[size=3].[/size][/b][/size]

[b][color=#FF9900]If you like what I did, go back and support me.
This is the best way to thank me for my work.[/color]
[/b][color=#336600][b]
I tried to do everything as best I can.
If you notice any mistakes, errors please let me know.
Comments, suggestions, pictures, any feedback etc... greatly appreciated.
[/b][/color]
[color=#ff0000][i][b]Work In Progress[/b][/i][/color]
[color=#ff7700][b]09-03-2015[/b][/color]

[size=2][b]I started doing a new version, which will contain esp.
The advantage is that each of the bottles will be different and unique.

[color=#ff7700][size=3]New version with ESP will be a fully integrable using [font=Verdana][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1840/?]Wrye Bash[/url][/size][/font].
So it really will not be any ESP.[/size][/color]

Patch for Skyrim Redone and Perkus Maximus will be available after finishing work on vanilla version.[/b][/size]

[color=#ff7700][b]It's almost finished[/b]
[/color][b][color=#ff7700]~70 % IS DONE[/color][/b]
[color=#ff7700][size=2]Click image to enlarge.[/size][/color]
[url=http://i.imgur.com/njRm5LI.png][img]http://i.imgur.com/njRm5LIl.png[/img][/url][b][url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?showtopic=2539004]
[/url][/b]
[b][img]http://i.imgur.com/PWTn03ol.png[/img]
[color=#38761D]for updates.[/color][/b]

[color=#FF9900][size=5][b]Credits[/b][/size][/color]

>>> Unfortunately, this is becoming less common practice. <<<
>>> And instead, we get... ( Better to "create" next DLC ) <<<[/size][/size]

author: InsanePlumber

files.name: Insane Alchemy version 2.0
files.changelogHtml:
All meshes made from scratch in 3D Max 2012. (usually 2-3 times more poligons)
- New larger than a bottle of collisions, now you can easily be laid the bottle. (It's still as good as I would like)
- Textures for all bottles.
